name: Fish Hike
description: There is a great chance to catch a fish every cast. If you get a red exclamation point during fishing, it means that a fish took your bait... If you don't get any indication of that or the fish fight meter, it means the fish have avoided that cast... try again... Later updates will signal when a fish is not interested in that cast. More fish to come. Also, later updates will allow you to play personal music from your files. Wasting time never sounded so good...
